thread.title: Ground News - Vietnam veteran blends music with history in teaching about the war
thread.title_full: Ground News - Vietnam veteran blends music with history in teaching about the war

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Vietnam veteran blends music with history in teaching about the war
text:
Summary by Ground News Vietnam veteran Tom Dowell was 18 when he received his draft card in 1966. He enlisted in the Air Force to learn marketable skills and get a higher-paying job. Dowell spent 30 months as a heavy equipment operator working in Europe and Libya. Two months before he left for Vietnam in September 1969 he proposed to his wife Mary. Share menu More
